hexagram.name: The Receptive
hexagram.text: Be open to change. Going with the flow brings success.

hexagram.name: Return
hexagram.text: Coming and going. Having somewhere to be.

hexagram.name: The Army
hexagram.text: The team requires patience and fortitude. Bringing people together.

hexagram.name: Approach
hexagram.text: The goal is approaching. Patience and tolerance.

hexagram.name: Modesty
hexagram.text: Being reserved brings success.

hexagram.name: Darkening of the Light
hexagram.text: Fortitude and persistence are required for what's coming.

hexagram.name: Pushing Upward
hexagram.text: Continue building up small things.

hexagram.name: Peace
hexagram.text: Good fortune approaches.

hexagram.name: Enthusiasm
hexagram.text: Good change comes to those who encourage it.

hexagram.name: The Arousing
hexagram.text: A surprise is coming. Prepare.

hexagram.name: Deliverance
hexagram.text: Forgive past mistakes. Liberation is the solution.

hexagram.name: The Marrying Maiden
hexagram.text: Promises bring bad luck.

hexagram.name: Preponderance of the Small
hexagram.text: Small things are important. Large things are not.

hexagram.name: Abundance
hexagram.text: The goal is reached. Rejoice.

hexagram.name: Duration
hexagram.text: Perseverance will bring success. Do not budge.

hexagram.name: The Power of the Great
hexagram.text: Perseverance will bring success. Be bold.

hexagram.name: Holding Together
hexagram.text: Union brings success. Consult the oracle again.

hexagram.name: Difficulty at the Beginning
hexagram.text: Persistence and fortitude bring good fortune.

hexagram.name: The Abysmal
hexagram.text: Sincerity brings success.

hexagram.name: Limitation
hexagram.text: Persisting within confounding constraints brings misfortune.

hexagram.name: Obstruction
hexagram.text: Hardship comes. Persistence and fortitude bring success.

hexagram.name: After Completion
hexagram.text: Prepare to defend from misfortune.

hexagram.name: The Well
hexagram.text: A renewal is coming.

hexagram.name: Waiting
hexagram.text: Remain uninvolved.

hexagram.name: Gathering Together
hexagram.text: Companionship bring good fortune.

hexagram.name: Following
hexagram.text: Following brings superb fortune.

hexagram.name: Oppression
hexagram.text: Hold your ground. Stake your life. Be not exhausted.

hexagram.name: The Joyous
hexagram.text: Exert influence openly.

hexagram.name: Influence
hexagram.text: Attraction brings good fortune.

hexagram.name: Revolution
hexagram.text: Abolish the old ways. Fortitude brings success.

hexagram.name: Preponderance of the Great
hexagram.text: Be not concerned when you surpass your peers.

hexagram.name: Break
hexagram.text: Danger. Separation.

hexagram.name: Splitting Apart
hexagram.text: Misfortune comes to the uncharitable.

hexagram.name: The Corners of the Mouth
hexagram.text: Fortitude brings luck. Seek nourishment, but be careful with words.

hexagram.name: Youthful Folly
hexagram.text: Inexperience. Fortitude can be bolstered through thoroughness.

hexagram.name: Decrease
hexagram.text: Control temper and instincts.

hexagram.name: Keeping Still
hexagram.text: The situation cannot be changed yet.

hexagram.name: Grace
hexagram.text: Embellishment leads to success. But not on controversial matters.

hexagram.name: Work on the Decayed
hexagram.text: Repairing the broken. Crossing a boundary advances one.

hexagram.name: The Taming Power of the Great
hexagram.text: Accumulate wisdom. It advances one to enter the unknown.

hexagram.name: Progress
hexagram.text: Self-improvement and self-promotion bring success.

hexagram.name: Biting Through
hexagram.text: A good time for hard decisions.

hexagram.name: Before Completion
hexagram.text: Allow everything to fall into place.

hexagram.name: Opposition
hexagram.text: Retain one's own individuality. Division. Diverging views.

hexagram.name: The Wanderer
hexagram.text: Travel brings success.

hexagram.name: The Clinging
hexagram.text: Cherish one's dependents. Attachment.

hexagram.name: The Cauldron
hexagram.text: Establish a new position.

hexagram.name: Great Possession
hexagram.text: Success in independence. Freedom advances one.

hexagram.name: Contemplation
hexagram.text: Withholding and contemplating brings success.

hexagram.name: Increase
hexagram.text: Undertake something. Time to take action.

hexagram.name: Dispersion
hexagram.text: The spread of ideas.

hexagram.name: Inner Truth
hexagram.text: Remain focused. Do not allow misinterpretation.

hexagram.name: Development
hexagram.text: Favorable outlook. Act in accordance with virtue.

hexagram.name: The Family
hexagram.text: Fortitude brings good fortune.

hexagram.name: The Gentle
hexagram.text: Exert subtle influence.

hexagram.name: Small Taming
hexagram.text: Time to accumulate resources.

hexagram.name: Standstill
hexagram.text: Persevere through stagnation.

hexagram.name: Innocence
hexagram.text: Misfortune comes to those who act rashly.

hexagram.name: Conflict
hexagram.text: It does not advance one to enter the unknown.

hexagram.name: Treading
hexagram.text: Continue with alertness.

hexagram.name: Retreat
hexagram.text: Withdraw. Remain at a safe distance.

hexagram.name: Fellowship
hexagram.text: Partnership advances one.

hexagram.name: Coming to Meet
hexagram.text: An auspicious encounter. But do not linger.

hexagram.name: The Creative
hexagram.text: Absolute success. One will achieve advancement through fortitude.
